Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, you'll be centrally located in Marseille, steps from Hotel de Ville and minutes from Musee des Docks Romains. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of La Vieille Charite and Centre de la Vieille Charite.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 194 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Marseille? This hotel has 2260 square feet (210 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hotel de Ville - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Musee des Docks Romains - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
La Vieille Charite - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Centre de la Vieille Charite - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Musee d'Archeologie Mediterraneenne - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Musee Regards de Provence - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cathedral la Major - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Musee d'Histoire de Marseille - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Centre Bourse - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Jardin des Vestiges - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Vieux Port - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Marseille Tourism Office - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Musee de la Marine - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Civilizations in Europe and the Mediterranean - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
La Criee National Theater of Marseille - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Aix-en-Provence (QXB-Aix en Provence TGV Train Station) - 18 km / 11.2 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 20 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
